seo: Tomcat,漏洞检测,CVE-2017-12617,文件上传漏洞,高危漏洞
summary: 该插件用于检测Apache Tomcat服务器是否存在CVE-2017-12617漏洞，即PUT方法导致的文件上传漏洞，风险等级为高危。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Apache Tomcat server has the CVE-2017-12617 vulnerability, which is a file upload vulnerability caused by the PUT method, with a high-risk level.
